title: Air Traffic Cargo Statistics
description: A. SUMMARY This dataset consists of San Francisco International Airport (SFO) air traffic cargo dataset contains data about cargo volume into and out of SFO, in both metric tons and pounds, with monthly totals by airline, region and aircraft type. B. HOW THE DATASET IS CREATED Data is self-reported by airlines and is only available at a monthly level. C. UPDATE PROCESS Data is available starting in July 1999 and will be updated monthly. D. HOW TO USE THIS DATASET Airport data is seasonal in nature; therefore, any comparative analyses should be done on a period-over-period basis (i.e. January 2010 vs. January 2009) as opposed to period-to-period (i.e. January 2010 vs. February 2010). It is also important to note that fact and attribute field relationships are not always 1-to-1. For example, Cargo Statistics belonging to United Airlines will appear in multiple attribute fields and are additive, which provides flexibility for the user to derive categorical Cargo Statistics as desired. E. RELATED DATASETS A summary of monthly comparative air-traffic statistics is also available on SFOâ€™s internet site at https://www.flysfo.com/about/media/facts-statistics/air-traffic-statistics

columns.name: Activity Period
columns.description: The year and month when this activity occurred

columns.name: Activity Period Start Date
columns.description: Start date of the year and month when this activity occurred

columns.name: Operating Airline
columns.description: Airline name for the operator of aircraft with cargo activity.

columns.name: Operating Airline IATA Code
columns.description: The International Air Transport Association (IATA) two-letter designation for the Operating Airline.

columns.name: Published Airline
columns.description: Airline name that issues the ticket and books revenue for cargo activity.

columns.name: Published Airline IATA Code
columns.description: The International Air Transport Association (IATA) two-letter designation for the Published Airline.

columns.name: GEO Summary
columns.description: An airport-defined high-level geographical categoration of the flight operations

columns.name: GEO Region
columns.description: An airport-defined world region of the flight operations

columns.name: Activity Type Code
columns.description: Short code that represents the type of activities such as enplaned, deplaned, and transit

columns.name: Cargo Type Code
columns.description: Short code that represents a broad categorization of the type of cargo such as "mail"

columns.name: Cargo Aircraft Type
columns.description: Short code that represents the type of the cargo aircraft

columns.name: Cargo Weight LBS
columns.description: The weight (in pounds) of air cargo associated with General and Cargo Statistics attribute fields.

columns.name: Cargo Metric TONS
columns.description: The weight (in metric tons) of air cargo associated with General and Cargo Statistics attribute fields.

columns.name: data_as_of
columns.description: Datetime of the data as of
